title: Smart Data Models - RAMI4.0 Asset Administration Shell -Asset- Generic schema
description: Based on IDTA-01001-3-0, defines the Asset -instance- linked to a given AAS a generic Asset Administration Shell - AAS -  component of the RAMI4.0

type.description: Property. It has to be RAMI4.0 I4Asset NGSI Entity type

hasDataSpecification.description: Property. Data specification defines the additional attributes an asset may have. RAMI4.0 specification

type.description: Property. Link, url or descriptionof the specified data

assetIdentificationModelRef.description: Property. An asset typically may be represented by several different identification properties like for example the serial number, its RFID code etc. Such local identification properties are defined in the asset identification submodel

keys.description: Property. keys for the asset instance

local.description: Property. True if this is local item. False if not

index.description: Property. Integer related to the item

billOfMaterialRef.description: Property. A complex asset is composed out of other entities and assets. These entities and assets being part of the asset are specified in the bill of material

keys.description: Property. Keys for the Semantic ID

local.description: Property. Whether if the item is local

identification.description: Property. Identification of the AAS -Asset- Instance object

idType.description: Property. Type of the Identifier, eg.IRI or IRD

id.description: Property. Identity information that unambiguously distinguishes one RAMI Instance from another one

version.description: Property. AAS version number is the number in line with release of specification

revision.description: Property. AAS Revision number is the number in line with release of specification

idShort.description: Property. Short id (name) of the RAMI Instance

category.description: Property. The category is a value that gives further meta information w.r.t. to the class of the AAS

modelType.description: Property. Instance model type according to IDTA

name.description: Property. Type of the referenced item

kind.description: Property. Kind of the Schema. This is restricted to Instance

descriptions.description: Property. For adding detailed knowldedge in different languages

language.description: Property. Substring identifying the language. Acronym according to ISO 639-1

text.description: Property. Add the description text here
